MODULE.name: System
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW: is used to either navigate to a URL or call a javascript function when an attached card reader decodes data.
MODULE.MORE_HELP: Only the foreground RhoElements application is given access to the card reader hardware, when an application is sent to the background its state will be saved and it will automatically relinquish control of the card reader. When brought back to the foreground, an application previously using the card reader will have its previous configuration (eg. pinTimeout) reapplied to the card reader automatically.

PROPERTIES.DESC: object supports this properties bla bla bla :

PROPERTY.name: platform
PROPERTY.DESC: Platform where application is running.

PROPERTY.name: hasCamera
PROPERTY.DESC: Is camera available on the device.

PROPERTY.name: screenWidth
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen width in logical pixels (used for set coordinates).

PROPERTY.name: screenHeight
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen height in logical pixels (used for set coordinates).

PROPERTY.name: realScreenWidth
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen width in real pixels.

PROPERTY.name: realScreenHeight
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen height in real pixels.

PROPERTY.name: screenOrientation
PROPERTY.DESC: Current screen orientation.

PROPERTY.name: ppiX
PROPERTY.DESC: Horizontal PPI (Pixels Per Inch).

PROPERTY.name: ppiY
PROPERTY.DESC: Vertical PPI (Pixels Per Inch).

PROPERTY.name: phoneNumber
PROPERTY.DESC: Device phone number.

PROPERTY.name: deviceOwnerEmail
PROPERTY.DESC: Primary email of phone owner (works only on Android).

PROPERTY.name: deviceOwnerName
PROPERTY.DESC: Name(account name) of phone owner (works only on Android).

PROPERTY.name: devicePushId
PROPERTY.DESC: Push notifications device ID which may be used to receive push messages.

PROPERTY.name: phoneId
PROPERTY.DESC: Hardware based ID. It depends on capabilities configured for an application and has to remain same even across application uninstall/install.

PROPERTY.name: deviceName
PROPERTY.DESC: Name of device application running on. Examples: '9000' (BB), 'iPhone', 'dream' (Android).

PROPERTY.name: osVersion
PROPERTY.DESC: Version OS of device. Examples: '4.6.0.192' (BB), '3.0' (iPhone), '1.6' (Android).

PROPERTY.name: locale
PROPERTY.DESC: Current device locale.Like 'en', 'ru' etc.

PROPERTY.name: country
PROPERTY.DESC: Current device country code.

PROPERTY.name: isEmulator
PROPERTY.DESC: Is application is running on emulator.

PROPERTY.name: hasCalendar
PROPERTY.DESC: Is calendar support is available.

PROPERTY.name: isMotorolaDevice
PROPERTY.DESC: Is device supports Motorola device capabilities, such as Scanner, etc.

PROPERTY.name: oemInfo
PROPERTY.DESC: The OEM Information string for the terminal.

PROPERTY.name: uuid
PROPERTY.DESC: The Unique Unit IDentifier for the terminal.

PROPERTY.name: applicationIconBadge
PROPERTY.DESC: Set the application icon to have this badge number. Set to 0 (zero) to remove badge.iOS only.

PROPERTY.name: httpProxyURI
PROPERTY.DESC: Client HTTP proxy.

PROPERTY.name: lockWindowSize
PROPERTY.DESC: Lock/unlock the window size change by the user. Implemented only for Windows desktop.

PROPERTY.name: showKeyboard
PROPERTY.DESC: Display\hide software keyboard.

PROPERTY.name: localServerPort
PROPERTY.DESC: Port of the local (embedded) HTTP server. This parameter is mainly for debug purposes. If not specified, application will use dynamically selected one.

PROPERTY.name: freeServerPort
PROPERTY.DESC: Get free local server port, available for binding.

PROPERTY.name: screenAutoRotate
PROPERTY.DESC: Screen auto rotate.

PROPERTY.name: hasTouchscreen
PROPERTY.DESC: Is device has touch screen.

PROPERTY.name: securityTokenNotPassed
PROPERTY.DESC: Is the security token check was failed.

PROPERTY.name: webviewFramework
PROPERTY.DESC: Browser framework identity string.

PROPERTY.name: screenSleeping
PROPERTY.DESC: Should screen go to sleep by timeout.

PROPERTY.name: hasNetwork
PROPERTY.DESC: USE Network.hasNetwork: Is device connected to the network.

PROPERTY.name: hasWifiNetwork
PROPERTY.DESC: USE Network.hasWifiNetwork: Is device connected to the wifi network

PROPERTY.name: hasCellNetwork
PROPERTY.DESC: USE Network.hasCellNetwork: Is device connected to the cell network.

PROPERTY.name: hasSqlite
PROPERTY.DESC: Does sqlite used on this platform.

METHOD.name: applicationInstall
METHOD.DESC: Install an application.

PARAM.name: applicationUrl
PARAM.DESC: The url of an application to install on the device.

METHOD.name: isApplicationInstalled
METHOD.DESC: Is application installed on the device?

PARAM.name: applicationName
PARAM.DESC: The name of the application.

METHOD.name: applicationUninstall
METHOD.DESC: Uninstall the application.

PARAM.name: applicationName
PARAM.DESC: The name of the application.

METHOD.name: getStartParams
METHOD.DESC: Return the command line parameters.

METHOD.name: openUrl
METHOD.DESC: Open the application associated with the URL.

PARAM.name: url
PARAM.DESC: Open the application at this url; behavior may be different on different platforms and depend on installed software.

METHOD.name: unzipFile
METHOD.DESC: Unzip file.

PARAM.name: localPathToZip
PARAM.DESC: The path to the file to be unzipped.

PARAM.name: password
PARAM.DESC: Password for the zip.

METHOD.name: zipFile
METHOD.DESC: Zip one file.

PARAM.name: localPathToZip
PARAM.DESC: The path to the specified zip.

PARAM.name: localPathToFile
PARAM.DESC: The path to the file to be zipped.

PARAM.name: password
PARAM.DESC: Password for the zip.

METHOD.name: zipFiles
METHOD.DESC: Zip list of files.

PARAM.name: localPathToZip
PARAM.DESC: The path to the specified zip.

PARAM.name: basePath
PARAM.DESC: Base path to the files to be zipped.

PARAM.name: filePathsToZip
PARAM.DESC: List of file paths to be zipped.

PARAM.name: password
PARAM.DESC: Password for the zip.

METHOD.name: setRegistrySetting
METHOD.DESC: setRegistrySetting

PARAM.name: hive
PARAM.DESC: The hive name

PARAM.name: type
PARAM.DESC: The hive name

PARAM.name: subKey
PARAM.DESC: The name of the sub key to set

PARAM.name: setting
PARAM.DESC: The name of the setting within the sub key

PARAM.name: value
PARAM.DESC: The string value to be set

METHOD.name: getRegistrySetting
METHOD.DESC: getRegistrySetting

PARAM.name: hive
PARAM.DESC: The hive name

PARAM.name: subKey
PARAM.DESC: The name of the sub key to be retrieved

PARAM.name: setting
PARAM.DESC: The name of the setting within the sub key

METHOD.name: setWindowFrame
METHOD.DESC: Change application window position and size. Implemented only for Windows desktop.

PARAM.name: x
PARAM.DESC: Left corner of window.

PARAM.name: y
PARAM.DESC: Top corner of window.

PARAM.name: width
PARAM.DESC: Width of window.

PARAM.name: height
PARAM.DESC: Height of window.

METHOD.name: setWindowPosition
METHOD.DESC: Change application window position. Implemented only for Windows desktop.

PARAM.name: x
PARAM.DESC: Left corner of window.

PARAM.name: y
PARAM.DESC: Top corner of window.

METHOD.name: setWindowSize
METHOD.DESC: Change application window size. Implemented only for Windows desktop.

PARAM.name: width
PARAM.DESC: Width of the window.

PARAM.name: height
PARAM.DESC: Width of the of window.

METHOD.name: bringToFront
METHOD.DESC: Bring application window to the top of the screen.

METHOD.name: replaceCurrentBundle
METHOD.DESC: Replace application bundle.

PARAM.name: pathToBundle
PARAM.DESC: Path to bundle.

PARAM.name: params
PARAM.DESC: Update parameters.

METHOD.name: deleteFolder
METHOD.DESC: Delete folder.

PARAM.name: pathToFolder
PARAM.DESC: Path to folder.

METHOD.name: setDoNotBackupAttribute
METHOD.DESC: Set do not backup attribute for file.

PARAM.name: pathToFile
PARAM.DESC: Path to file.

PARAM.name: doNotBackup
PARAM.DESC: true set doNotBakup attribute to file (exlude this file from bakup), false for remove doNotBakup attribute from file

METHOD.name: isBlobAttr
METHOD.DESC: Use Database.isBlobAttr: is model attribute is blob.

METHOD.name: updateBlobAttribs
METHOD.DESC: Use Database.updateBlobAttribs: update model blob attributes list.

METHOD.name: get_locale
METHOD.DESC: Use System.locale property: Current device locale.

METHOD.name: set_locale
METHOD.DESC: Use Application.locale property: set application specific locale

METHOD.name: setPushNotification
METHOD.DESC: Use Push.setPushNotification: Register push callback, the method to call upon receiving a push message.

PARAM.name: url
PARAM.DESC: URL of the callback method. If empty, unregisters rhoconnect-push.

PARAM.name: url_params
PARAM.DESC: Params which will be added to callback URL.

PARAM.name: push_client
PARAM.DESC: Name of a push service client. Current values can be 'rhoconnect_push' or 'gcm' or 'legacy' or empty.

CAN_BE_NIL.DESC: The call will be applied to every push client.

METHOD.name: setScreenRotationNotification
METHOD.DESC: Use ScreenOrientation.setNotification: Notify (call a callback method) when the screen rotates.

PARAM.name: url
PARAM.DESC: URL of the callback method. If empty, unregisters notification callback.

PARAM.name: url_params
PARAM.DESC: Params which will be added to callback URL.

METHOD.name: exit
METHOD.DESC: Use Application.quit: exit application.

METHOD.name: set_sleeping
METHOD.DESC: Use System.screenSleeping property: enable/disable phone sleeping.

METHOD.name: startTimer
METHOD.DESC: Use Timer.start: start timer.

PARAM.name: interval
PARAM.DESC: Timer interval.

PARAM.name: url
PARAM.DESC: URL of the callback method.

PARAM.name: url_params
PARAM.DESC: Params which will be added to callback URL.

METHOD.name: stopTimer
METHOD.DESC: Use Timer.stop: stop timer.

PARAM.name: url
PARAM.DESC: URL of the callback method which identify the timer to stop.

METHOD.name: setNetworkStatusNotify
METHOD.DESC: Use Network.setStatusNotify: set network notification callback.

PARAM.name: url
PARAM.DESC: The url to the user-defined callback method.

PARAM.name: poll_interval
PARAM.DESC: iOS. The network status polling period for systems that can not notify network status change immediately. Default value is 20 seconds.

METHOD.name: clearNetworkStatusNotify
METHOD.DESC: Use Network.clearStatusNotify: Clear network status callback.

METHOD.name: set_http_proxy_url
METHOD.DESC: Use System.httpProxyURI property: To use client with the HTTP proxy

METHOD.name: unset_http_proxy
METHOD.DESC: Use System.httpProxyURI property: Stop using HTTP proxy that was set by the command line, rhoconfig.txt or set_http_proxy_url.

METHOD.name: set_application_icon_badge
METHOD.DESC: Use System.applicationIconBadge: Set the application icon to have this badge number. Set to 0 (zero) to remove badge.iOS only.

METHOD.name: runApplication
METHOD.DESC: Use System.Process.runApplication: Run an application.

PARAM.name: appName
PARAM.DESC: The name of the application on the device to run.

PARAM.name: params
PARAM.DESC: The name of the application on the device to run.

PARAM.name: blockingCall
PARAM.DESC: The name of the application on the device to run.
